ROW.DATDSC: select '[%YYMM1]'||'~'||'[%YYMM2]' yyyy,tousr,sum(cnt1) cnt1,sum(cnt2) cnt2,sum(cnt3) cnt3,sum(cnt4) cnt4,'' avgtim,sum(tim) tim from ( select todept,nvl(tousr,'未分派') tousr,count(*) cnt1, nvl(count(decode(stat,'9',1,null)),0) cnt2, nvl(count(decode(stat,'3',1,null)),0) cnt3, nvl(count(decode(stat,'1',1,'2',1,'0',1,'8',1,null)),0) cnt4, '' avgtim, decode(stat,'9',round(sum(redat-crtdat) /count(1),2),0) tim from tax_trkhdr where tousr is not null and to_char(dat,'yyyy-MM') >='[%YYMM1]' and to_char(dat,'yyyy-MM')<='[%YYMM2]' and nvl(todept,' ') like '[%SWJG]%' [%TAXMAN] group by todept,tousr,stat ) group by todept,tousr
